name: Masochist»
ability: Nominations on you only succeed if all living evil players vote. Good can't win.

jinxes.reason: If a Pit-Hag creates a Masochist, the Storyteller chooses which player it is.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If the Spy is or has been in play, the Masochist is poisoned
If the Widow is or has been in play, the Masochist is poisoned

name: Ostra»
ability: Townsfolk and Minions might register as Outsiders. You must to good abilities. [-1 Outsider]
flavor: Hey bestie, just wanted you to know they're all talking about you behind your back. Not me though, I'm always here for you.
